news.description: A marriage rededication ceremony featured worshippers holding AR-15s at the controversial Sanctuary Church in Pennsylvania.
news.title: Couples clutching  AR-15 rifles renew wedding vows

news.description: The Russian president is giving his annual address ahead of the upcoming election.
news.title: Putin vows to halve poverty in Russia

news.description: The latest hack of German government networks involved complex malicious software and targeted more sensitive data than a 2015 breach of the German parliament, a leading member of Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives said on Thursday.
news.title: Cyber attack on German government sought more sensitive data than 2015 hack: lawmaker

news.description: The president scolded Jeff Sessions after he suggested that the Justice Department’s inspector general would look into accusations of surveillance abuses.
news.title: Trump Calls Sessions’s Handling of Surveillance Abuse Allegations ‘Disgraceful’

news.description: Both firms say customers will have to be 21 to buy a gun. Both are also putting new curbs on ammunition purchases in response to the Parkland, Fla., high school shootings.
news.title: Walmart Joins Dick's Sporting Goods In Tighter Limits On Gun Sales
